record.name: FSPA
record.description:
File Shape Address (FSPA).

Class and fields descriptions are quoted from Microsoft Office Word 97-2007 Binary File Format
record.author: Sergey Vladimirov; according to Microsoft Office Word 97-2007 Binary File Format Specification [*.doc]

field.name: spid
field.description: Shape Identifier. Used in conjunction with the office art data (found via fcDggInfo in the FIB) to find the actual data for this shape

field.name: xaLeft
field.description: Left of rectangle enclosing shape relative to the origin of the shape

field.name: yaTop
field.description: Top of rectangle enclosing shape relative to the origin of the shape

field.name: xaRight
field.description: Right of rectangle enclosing shape relative to the origin of the shape

field.name: yaBottom
field.description: Bottom of the rectangle enclosing shape relative to the origin of the shape

bit.name: fHdr
bit.description: 1 in the undo doc when shape is from the header doc, 0 otherwise (undefined when not in the undo doc)

bit.name: bx
bit.description: X position of shape relative to anchor CP

const.name: TEXT
const.description: relative to text (column for horizontal text; paragraph for vertical text)

bit.name: by
bit.description: Y position of shape relative to anchor CP

const.name: TEXT
const.description: relative to text (paragraph for horizontal text; column for vertical text)

const.name: AROUNDABSOLUTENR
const.description: like 2, but doesnâ€˜t require absolute object

const.name: NOOBJECT
const.description: wrap as if no object present

bit.name: wrk
bit.description: Text wrapping mode type (valid only for wrapping modes 2 and 4

bit.name: fRcaSimple
bit.description: When set, temporarily overrides bx, by, forcing the xaLeft, xaRight, yaTop, and yaBottom fields to all be page relative.

field.name: cTxbx
field.description: Count of textboxes in shape (undo doc only)
